titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The Mifflin-Mifflintown Ministerium was an organization of Presbyterian ministers from the area of Mifflintown, Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of minutes, 1925 to 1947, of the Mifflin-Mifflintown Ministerium. The minutes document financial offerings, program planning, and routine meeting business. The volume also includes lists of special services and preachers at those services (1925-1952).

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Carlisle Presbytery, Historical Library, Wilson College (11/15/73)
